main.name: Ariel Rodríguez
main.occupation: Software Engineer and a Freelance Developer
main.description: Very passionate about working with others to provide solutions and to help those who need it
main.bio: Hi, my name is Ariel Rodríguez Boza. I'm a Software Engineer who is very passionate about coding. I'm very committed to working with others and eager to continue learning. Currently I'm currently a freelance Developer working at Silcon Technology as part of an Internship. I'm learning how to use Telerik UI in ASP.NET Core applications and how to develop applications using React JS and React Native.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

testimonials.text: He is a very committed person in his work and extremely responsible. He demonstrates great development and communication skills. I'm grateful that he can be part of my work team.
testimonials.user: René Morice Castro - CEO of Silcon Technology
